thread.title: Cherokee
thread.title_full: Pure Diesel Power reviewed by Cherokee

author: Cherokee
title: Cherokee
text: After changing my filter a few times I noticed the cheap plastic Ram fuel filter cap head started rounding. I searched for a better solution to my problem and came across DP's billet cap. Ordering was easy, shipping was fast and installation was simple. So far I have had no issues or check engine lights.
